definition: to give up in the face of defeat of lacking hope
details:
verb
- to give up in the face of defeat of lacking hope
= example: to give up in the face of defeat of lacking hope
= synonyms: give up
- to go away or leave
= example: to go away or leave
= synonyms: absent
- to turn away from
= example: to turn away from
= synonyms: renounce
- to give up or retire from a position
= example: to give up or retire from a position
= synonyms: step down
- to put an end to a state or an activity
= example: to put an end to a state or an activity
= synonyms: stop
